scrape_info.input: ny times'ın türkiye afganları kabul etmiyor haberi

entries.title: ny times'ın türkiye afganları kabul etmiyor haberi
entries.author: weight26
entries.content:
bircogu iran’i gecmis de türkiye sinirinda sert bi direncle karsilasmislae guya. avukatlar da uluslararasi anlasmalara aykiri oldugunu soyluyormus. ba ba ba. ulan yunanlarin ordugu duvardan niye bahsetmiyosun? her gun avrupali bi bakanin biz gocmen kabul edemeyiz demeleri falan mesela?

--- spoiler ---

weeks before kabul fell to the taliban, tens of thousands of afghans were already fleeing their country each week. many of them traveled 1,400 miles across ıran, hoping to make their way to europe. but the migrants were met with sharp resistance at turkey’s border, with thousands waiting in ıran’s border region.

ın a single operation in july, more than 1,400 afghans who had crossed into turkey were rounded up and pushed back by turkish police. lawyers say the expulsions violate the international convention on refugees
--- spoiler ---

umarim iktidar halkin tepkisini ciddiye almistir.
